item.title: By: barbie
item.dc:creator: barbie
item.description: Solar energy is definitely the future. More and more people around the world are turning towards solar energy. It's green, affordable, and you can even sell it to others. Solar power to all!
item.content:encoded: Solar energy is definitely the future. More and more people around the world are turning towards solar energy. It’s green, affordable, and you can even sell it to others. Solar power to all!
